question: All India Conference of Director Generals /Inspector Generals of Police was organized in which city?
explanation: All India Conference of Director Generals /Inspector Generals of Police was organised in Pune from December 6 to 8, 2019. IISER, which is under the Human Resource Development Ministry, was declared an institute of national importance in 2012. The theme of the conference was scientific and forensics-based investigation and technology-enabled policing. A number of sessions on these subjects were held during the three-day conference and the home minister also held sessions with the top brass of police.
